Header.acknowledgement: This data is provided by Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC).
Header.author: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)
Header.license_preamble: The data is owned by the Government of Canada (Environment and Climate Change Canada), and fall under the licence agreement for use of Environment and Climate Change Canada data.
Header.product: A cross-country summary of the averages and extremes for the month, including precipitation totals, max-min temperatures, and degree days.

cdd.comments: Station data converted from Cool Deg Days (°C)
cdd.long_name: Number of Degrees Celsius Over a Mean Temperature of 18 °C

hdd.comments: Station data converted from Heat Deg Days (°C)
hdd.long_name: Number of Degrees Celsius Under a Mean Temperature of 18 °C

pr.comments: Station data converted from Total Precip (mm) using a density of 1000 kg/m³

prlp.comments: Station data converted from Total Rain (mm) using a density of 1000 kg/m³

prsn.comments: station data converted from Total Snow (cm) using a density of 100 kg/m³

sfcWindAz.comments: Station data converted from Dir of Max Gust (10s deg)
sfcWindAz.long_name: Direction from which the Daily Maximum Near-Surface Gust Wind Speed maximum Blows

sfcWindMax.comments: Station data converted from Spd of Max Gust (km/h)
sfcWindMax.long_name: Daily Maximum Near-Surface Gust Wind Speed maximum

snd.comments: Station data converted from Snow on Grnd (cm)

tas.comments: Station data converted from Mean Temperature (°C)

tas_days.comments: Station data converted from Days With Valid Mean Temperature
tas_days.long_name: Number of Days With Valid Near-Surface Air Temperature

tasmax.comments: station data converted from Max Temp (°C)

tasmin.comments: Station data converted from Min Temp (°C)
